DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates effect of Ficus carica and Descurainia Sophia on irritable bowel syndrome predominant constipation. Half of patients receive Ficus carica while others receive Descurainia Sophia for 4 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison and Assessment of Effects of Flixweed and Fig on Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Predominant Constipation and Gastrointestinal Function: Single Blind Randomized Parallel Trial
DOC.criteria: patients with irritable bowel syndrome predominant constipation Subjects with significant cardiovascular, renal, hepatic, pulmonary, endocrine, metabolic, hematologic disorders, structural abnormalities of the gastrointestinal tract or diseases ‚ÅÑconditions that affected bowel transition, surgery, any prokinetic or laxative drug used during the past month, any medication that may affect gastrointestinal motility, other therapeutic dietary advice for IBS, used Fig or Flixweed during the last month, diarrhea, pregnancy or breastfeeding
